query: In 1610 Galileo became the first to find other moons when he saw moons orbiting this giant planet
doc: Go Observe | International Year of Astronomy 2009  Find Jupiter in the Sky. In January, 1610, Galileo pointed his telescope at Jupiter. ... But accompanying Jupiter, he saw four "stars" which followed the planet across ... Examples of Galileo's drawings, showing how Jupiter's four largest moons ... any heavenly bodies were seen clearly orbiting something other than the Earth.
